Sim Event Types¶

S4CLSimAddedOccultTypeEvent¶

class S4CLSimAddedOccultTypeEvent(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, occult_type: sims.occult.occult_enums.OccultType, occult_tracker: sims.occult.occult_tracker.OccultTracker)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.events.event_handling.common_event.CommonEvent

An event that occurs upon an Occult Type being added to a Sim.

property occult_tracker¶

The tracker that keeps track of the occult status of a Sim.

property occult_type¶

The type of occult that has been added to the Sim.

property sim_info¶

The SimInfo of a Sim.

S4CLSimChangedAgeEvent¶

class S4CLSimChangedAgeEvent(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, old_age: sims.sim_info_types.Age, new_age: sims.sim_info_types.Age)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.events.event_handling.common_event.CommonEvent

An event that occurs upon a Sim changing to a different age.

property new_age¶

The Age the Sim is now.

property old_age¶

The Age the Sim used to be.

property sim_info¶

The SimInfo of a Sim.

S4CLSimChangedOccultTypeEvent¶

class S4CLSimChangedOccultTypeEvent(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, occult_type: sims.occult.occult_enums.OccultType, occult_tracker: sims.occult.occult_tracker.OccultTracker)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.events.event_handling.common_event.CommonEvent

An Event that Occurs upon a Sim changing to an occult type.

property occult_tracker¶

The tracker that keeps track of the occult status of a Sim.

property occult_type¶

The type of occult a Sim has changed into.

property sim_info¶

The SimInfo of a Sim.

S4CLSimRemovedOccultTypeEvent¶

class S4CLSimRemovedOccultTypeEvent(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, occult_type: sims.occult.occult_enums.OccultType, occult_tracker: sims.occult.occult_tracker.OccultTracker)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.events.event_handling.common_event.CommonEvent

property occult_tracker¶

The tracker that keeps track of the occult status of a Sim.

property occult_type¶

The SimInfo of a Sim.
